Order Chaser - used to chase delivery of an outstanding order

Confirmation of Order by Ordering Company - used for

Confirmation of Delivery Status Report - confirms

Confirmation of Uplift Status Report - report of the

segment.desc: Only used when there needs to be more than one adjustment to the meter readings in CCD
segment.name: ADDITIONAL ADJUSTMENTS

segment.desc: Bill level references
segment.name: BILL CONTROL DATA

segment.desc: Bill level totals
segment.name: BILL TRAILER

segment.desc: Meter readings and charges
segment.name: CONSUMPTION/CHARGE DETAILS

segment.desc: Contract level references
segment.name: CONTRACT DATA

segment.desc: All values are in pounds
segment.name: VAT RATE CREDIT SUB-TRAILER

segment.desc: This segment normally only used if DELC = 1 or 3. If DELC = 1, list ALL lines at variance from the original instruction. If DELC = 3, list ALL lines. Alternatively, every line may be listed even for a complete delivery. In this situation, DELC will have a value of 0, and Reason for Variance a value of AA = No Variance
segment.name: DELIVERY CONFIRMATION DETAILS

segment.desc: Repeat for each pallet received
segment.name: DELIVERED PALLET IDENTITY

segment.desc: Repeatable for each exception condition to be reported
segment.name: EXCEPTION CONDITIONS

segment.desc: Used to show the Meter Administration Number. For electricity sector this is the Meter Point Administration Number (MPAN). For the gas sector this is the Meter point reference number (MNUMBER).
segment.name: METER ADMINISTRATION NUMBER

segment.desc: Used to show the factors/values modifying the base price when calculating the price charged
segment.name: CHARGE MODIFIERS

segment.desc: Repeat for each pallet delivered
segment.name: PALLET IDENTITY

segment.desc: Only used when VAT affected e.g. where different rates of VAT apply to the prepayment and the current charges
segment.name: PREPAYMENT RECEIVED (VAT INCLUSIVE)

segment.desc: This corresponds to the PYD segment used in the Payment Message Set
segment.name: PAYMENT DETAILS

segment.desc: This segment is used to specify the settlement terms which apply to the original invoice. The most favourable must be used for the VAT calculation
segment.name: SETTLEMENT TERMS

segment.desc: File level references
segment.name: ACCOUNT REFERENCE NUMBER

segment.desc: Used to refer transactions to reports, eg. order numbers/dates to orders in a period
segment.name: REPORT REFERENCES AND DATES

segment.desc: Repeat for each pallet returned
segment.name: RETURNED PALLET IDENTITY

segment.desc: Control totals of location time period
segment.name: TIME BASE CONTROL TOTALS

segment.desc: This segment is used only if data for more than one function for a period is to be repeated
segment.name: FUNCTION DATA SEGMENT

segment.desc: This segment is used only if data for more than one function for a period is to be reported
segment.name: FUNCTION DATA SEGMENT

segment.desc: All values are in pounds
segment.name: VAT RATE INVOICE SUB-TRAILER

segment.desc: File level totals
segment.name: UTILITY BILL FILE TOTALS

segment.desc: This segment only used if UPLC = 1 or 3. If UPLC = 1, list ALL lines at variance from the original instructions. If UPLC = 3, list ALL lines
segment.name: UPLIFT CONFIRMATION DETAILS

segment.desc: Only used where an original instruction was given resulting in the Uplift(s)
segment.name: UPLIFT INSTRUCTION REFERENCES

segment.desc: Repeats for each VAT rate applied in the bill
segment.name: VALUE ADDED TAX

segment.desc: VAT summary for each VAT rate applied in the file
segment.name: VAT RATE SUMMARY
